events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but decided I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit well.
The system identified this case as related to a refund due to customer's request for money back.
Assigning support agent to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return in more detail to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket runs very small and I need a refund because I don’t want to exchange it.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid shipping label.
That sounds perfect, thanks for the quick help. I will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount in your account shortly.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with our service.
Since your refund was processed and no further issues were reported, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us.
